text: Hussein "Hassani" Alwan (born 1 January 1955) is a former Iraqi football midfielder who played for Iraq in the 1976 AFC Asian Cup. He played for the national team between 1975 and 1976. ==References== Category:Iraqi footballers Category:Iraq international footballers Category:1976 AFC Asian Cup players Category:Living people Category:1955 births Category:Association football midfielders
title: Hassani Alwan
